entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
